Line 55: Line 55:
==Technical information==
==Technical information==
â
The movie was rendered on DNA Productions' 1400-[[CPU]] [[render farm]], managed by the [[open source]] [[Sun Grid Engine]] [[job scheduler]]. The nodes started out with [[Fedora Core]] 2 [[Linux]] with a modern 2.6.x kernel, but the new [[AMD]] [[Opteron]] nodes are running Fedora Core 4. Most of the applications are commercial, including [[Maya (software)|Maya]], [[Houdini (software)|Houdini]], [[Massive (software)|Massive]] and the Pixar [[RenderMan]]. <ref>[http://gridengine.info/pages/profile-DNA-Productions "Making movies with Grid Engine"]</ref>
+
The movie was rendered on DNA Productions' 1400-[[CPU]] [[render farm]], managed by the [[open source]] [[Sun Grid Engine]] [[job scheduler]]. The nodes started out with [[Fedora (operating system)|Fedora Core]] 2 [[Linux]] with a modern 2.6.x kernel, but the new [[AMD]] [[Opteron]] nodes are running Fedora Core 4. Most of the applications are commercial, including [[Maya (software)|Maya]], [[Houdini (software)|Houdini]], [[Massive (software)|Massive]] and the Pixar [[RenderMan]]. <ref>[http://gridengine.info/pages/profile-DNA-Productions "Making movies with Grid Engine"]</ref>
==IMAX 3D==
==IMAX 3D==
